name: Sun Hat
description: A sun hat with a brim - perfect for protection from a number of adverse weather conditions.
details: A sun hat with a brim - perfect for protection from a number of adverse weather conditions. DWR-treated and equipped with breathable mesh on the inside and an adjustable storm strap, making it cool, comfortable, practical and a new favourite travel companion. Designed with a graphic logo label at the front, for a distinctive look.

name: LEATHER HIGH-HEEL SHOES
details: PINK LEATHER HIGH-HEEL SHOES. ASYMMETRIC LEATHER UPPER. LINED STILETTO HEELS. POINTED TOES. AIRFIT®. FLEXIBLE TECHNICAL LATEX FOAM INSOLE, DESIGNED TO OFFER GREATER COMFORT. HEEL HEIGHT: 9.7 CM. / 3.8″

name: Wool Scarf
details: cosy pure wool scarf - It's long enough to wrap around a couple of times and features classic fringing at the short edges.

name: Sunglasses
description: Retro Round Polarized Sunglasses Silver Metal Circle Frame Gray Lens Circular
details: This pair of hipster sunglasses was made in round shaped. Perfect for men and women. Polarized lens helps to protect your eyes well.

name: Gloves
description: First Layer gloves are ideal for providing a layer of warmth and insulation for your hands.
details: Hand-stitched from 100% woven silk with a wool liner and features a gold-on-red pattern composed of various plumb bob silhouettes, including several Veritas plumb bobs as well as examples from the Lee Valley collection.

name: Socks
details: Toesock blister protection and freedom, NüWool™ odor resistance and thermoregulation – this is the liner for long treks and ambitious day hikes.

name: Rain Boot
details: Rain boot heel height: 50 mm - Upper: PVC - Sole: rubber - Lining: elastane

name: Feather Drop Earrings
description: Silver, Rose Gold Plated and Gold Plated Feather Drop Earrings
details: Designed with a contemporary mix of silver, rose gold plated and gold plated silver, these earrings showcase three pretty feathers with intricate engraving for a realistic feel. Your chic festival style is sorted with these gorgeous feather earrings.

name: Sneakers
details: A pair of round-toe navy blue sneakers, has regular styling, lace-up detail - Canvas upper - Cushioned footbed - Textured and patterned outsole
